channel.title: A-levels
channel.description: Well its exam season again and this year its a levels for me i know davidude is in the same boat, so what ones you get and when are they gonna be over

item.title: A-levels
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:21, topic:279242”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=368547.msg2792220#msg2792220 date=1242850718]

Mechanics is easy if you do physics. Wait till you do C3 and C4 next year.

ive already started C5 when i did further maths at the beginning of the year(at least i think they class it as C5 i cant remember how it works) and its easy. Mechanics is a fuckload harda than physics, physics is just basic mechanics whereas mechanics has tonnes more stupid ways of working that physics doesnt even cover
[/quote]

Meh you must be like Yakman, a natural mathematician.

I do well in specific areas but some stuff it just takes me ages to get my head around. Having said that last year was easy, then when my teacher changed everything seems to have got stupidly hard.[/quote]
some teachers are just stupid, they bought their qualifications from some Ethiopian teaching agency for half an ox and think they can come teach in england, they are just so stupid

Read full topic
